alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 11:12AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Collier County through 1145 AM EDT... At 1111 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Royal Palm Hammock, or near Marco Island, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds possible and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Marco Island, Chokoloskee, Golden Gate Estates, Everglades City, Plantation Island, Carnestown, Belle Meade, Cape Romano, Orangetree, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, Copeland, Vineyards, Royal Palm Hammock, Naples Park, Marco Island Airport, Naples Manor and West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
